selections.name: Stern Dispute
selections.reason: Excellent debut effort when 3rd at Gosford in Provincial company. Drops significantly in class to Country Maiden. The one to beat.

selections.name: Chistota
selections.reason: Solid debut 5th at Port Macquarie. Will strip fitter and draws well.

selections.name: Riga
selections.reason: Resuming from a spell. Trials have been encouraging. Watch market.

selections.name: Risk And Famous
selections.reason: Resuming for the Kris Lees stable. Drawn the inside and should be competitive.

danger_horse.name: Chistota
danger_horse.reason: Maher stable runner with scope for improvement.

selections.name: Oakfield Universe
selections.reason: Consistent performer who ran a strong 2nd at Wyong (Provincial) last start. This is a significant drop in grade. Top pick.

selections.name: Cool Summer Nights
selections.reason: Resuming for the Doyle yard. Won a recent trial and maps well.

selections.name: Double Or Quits
selections.reason: Drops back from Provincial grade. Drawn the rails and should be in the mix.

selections.name: Dianella
selections.reason: First starter from a good stable. Monitor betting moves.

danger_horse.name: Cool Summer Nights
danger_horse.reason: Trial form suggests she is ready to fire fresh.

selections.name: Our Pappy
selections.reason: Resuming. Has placed in better company previously and won a recent trial here.

selections.name: Markwell Music
selections.reason: Consistent type who wasn't far away last start. Should be competitive in this field.

selections.name: Blue Dane
selections.reason: Showed improvement to place last start. Each-way claims.

selections.name: The Simple Life
selections.reason: Experienced mare who draws well. Place chance.

danger_horse.name: Markwell Music
danger_horse.reason: Recent form is solid enough for this weak maiden.

selections.name: Fighting Magnus
selections.reason: Racing consistently with recent placings. Weights favor him here and distance suits.

selections.name: Charmed Destiny
selections.reason: Not beaten far last start. Proven at this level and trained by Sprague.

selections.name: Amalfi Amore
selections.reason: Winner two starts back on heavy ground. Soft track is a plus.

selections.name: Maui
selections.reason: Can mix form but has ability. Worth including in exotics.

danger_horse.name: Amalfi Amore
danger_horse.reason: Wet track specialist who could surprise if conditions deteriorate.

selections.name: Dollars
selections.reason: Ran a strong 2nd at Newcastle (Provincial) last start. Massive class drop to Country Class 1. Standout.

selections.name: Mortlake
selections.reason: Drops significantly in grade from Warwick Farm. Form reads poor numerically but class edge is real.

selections.name: Dwayne
selections.reason: Broke maiden status well two starts back. Faded late last time but can bounce back.

selections.name: Winters Ending
selections.reason: Consistent placer. Will be running on.

danger_horse.name: Mortlake
danger_horse.reason: Metro to Country drop is a major handicapping angle.

selections.name: Cashaway Gold
selections.reason: Resuming. Has a good strike rate (2 wins from 6) and trialled well. Looks ready.

selections.name: Bethsheba
selections.reason: Last start winner at this track. In good form and draws well.

selections.name: Love Child
selections.reason: Ran a solid 2nd in this grade last start. Must be respected.

selections.name: Canny Prospect
selections.reason: Drawn the rails. Can run a cheeky race at odds.

danger_horse.name: Bethsheba
danger_horse.reason: Winning form is good form. Hard to knock.

selections.name: Thedaythemusicdied
selections.reason: Won last start at this track/distance beating the main danger. In peak form.

selections.name: King Soleil
selections.reason: Runner-up to the top pick last start. Meets her slightly better at the weights.

selections.name: Sheila's Fanta Sea
selections.reason: Not far away last start. Wide draw is a concern but has ability.

selections.name: Cupid's Kiss
selections.reason: Consistent mare drawn the inside. Place chance.

danger_horse.name: King Soleil
danger_horse.reason: Weight swing in his favor could reverse the last start result.

selections.name: Satono Invader
selections.reason: Strong 2nd last start at Port Macquarie. Drawn perfectly to strike.

selections.name: Talana
selections.reason: Drops in class. Drawn the rails and gets a claim. Big danger.

selections.name: Fast Blue
selections.reason: Consistent type who placed last start. Wide draw makes it tougher.

selections.name: Khant Fail
selections.reason: Placed last start. Good draw.

danger_horse.name: Talana
danger_horse.reason: Class runner of the field. If right, wins.
